changes: Updates interface for macOS 11 Big Sur
Adds support for Password AutoFill on Big Sur!
Updates macOS App Icon
Drops support for macOS older than 10.12
Improves History list sorting by properly sorting most recently edited Entries at the top of the applicable section
Adds support for importing from Roboform and Bitwarden CSV
Fixes long Entry names not properly truncating in Entry View
Fixes crash when an error occurs during Local Folder sync
Fixes improper deletion of sync.lock file in Dropbox if created by another client when cleaning up
Improves import from 1Password, LastPass, and Keeper CSVs
Adds support for importing from Enpass CSV
Fixes label dropdown on Entry view not re-sorting after adding a label via customize labels
Fixes Codebook not prompting for Touch ID when mirroring to an external display but the screen lid is open
Adds a new Website Rules option to the Password Generator (at least one uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol character)
Adds a new, easier to use Add Field control to the Entry view in Edit mode
The Remove Field button is now disabled when no Field is selected
Clears out any previously entered name in the Create New Label window
Adjusts Create New Label window to set the Mode selector to Plain Text when it first loads
Refreshes the Preferences window interface
Adds a dedicated Updates tab to the Preferences window
Adds a new Release Channel setting for easily switching between Beta and Release updates
Adds a new View License window for looking up your license information (Codebook menu > View License...)
The Compact Database feature and menu item have been renamed Vacuum Database to correspond with current functionality
Fixes some keyboard event bugs in Secret Agent that prevented Run Default Action from working correctly in some cases
Fixes issue with Keeper CSV Import
Fixes a repetitive error message that could occur when the Desktop WiFi service encounters an error on start-up
Corrects display of the "I have a word list" button
Removes duplicate sync.lock files on Drive
Adds new advanced Sync options: Operations
Resets selected Operation to default after Sync
Updates the Sync menu, making the Start Sync item more clearly visible at the bottom and grouping other related menu items together
Updates the title of the Start Sync menu item to reflect the currently selected Operation
Fixes regression on Create New Category to drop user directly into the name field without any default title once the sheet presents
Provides Undo and Redo support for randomly generating passwords during Entry editing
Provides Undo support for field ordering/dragging
Explicitly clears the Undo stack when Entry editing ends (instead of when another Entry is selected)
Ensures that auxiliary windows and panels requiring database access are properly closed on application lock
Fixes failure to persist field edits immediately after pasting a copied Entry
Fixes an issue improperly preventing application termination
Improves menu bar item validation when the Main Window is not the active window and when the Main Window is locked
Updates the Help menu with links to the latest documentation and a link to the Codebook mailing list
Help menu items have been rearranged and grouped according to function
Updates the Entry menu, specifically the group of field-specific items at the bottom to match changes to the Fields table context menu for the currently selected field
Adjusts the fields context menu to display the Show/Hide item more visibly at the top, with a new mask/unmask icon on the menu item
Adjusts the fields context menu to improve the grouping and separation of related menu items
Adjusts the fields context menu to no longer display the Show/Hide item during editing
Integrity Check now reports number of affected records
Improve synchronization behavior on specific environments
Fixes out of memory crash
Fixes Types not properly sorted after adding new type in Entry interface
Fixes crash when leaving database info window open and initiating a WiFi sync
Fixes edge case unresponsive preference window crash
Fixes Sync Key scanning camera preview view not displaying on older macOS's
Fixes Sync Key QR Code Image graphics rendering bug on older macOS's
Fixes Secret Agent displaying incorrect results when typing quickly
Resolves crash when reporting an error during download files of Dropbox sync
Fixes release notes window being deactivated when displayed post login
Fixes failure to download changeset files error when syncing over WiFi
Adjusts the color of the sync status label in Preferences for better legibility in Light and Dark modes
Fixes failure to propagate field changes when quitting Codebook with pending edits
Improves recovery and error reporting when an error occurs during sync
Corrects behavior of first-time sync
Improves behavior of migrating Codebook 3 databases
Fixes "NSPlaceholderArray ... attempt to insert nil object" error related to cloud service account name not being loaded
Updates the Delete Sync Key confirmation prompt to be less alarming, and adds a Learn More button that links to relevant documentation
Updates the Sync feature with a new, faster, and more secure replication system
Updates the encryption Codebook uses to SQLCipher 4
Updates key derivation algorithm to PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA512 (previously PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA1)
Updates key derivation to use 250,000 iterations (previously 64,000)
Updates HMAC page protection algorithm to HMAC-SHA512 (previously HMAC-SHA1)
Adds new Dark Mode versions of the Database Icons
Fixes color of TOTP animation in Dark Mode
Makes Password Review available on-demand (right-click on any Password field to select Review Password, keyboard shortcut shift+command+R)
New Secret Agent getting started window under Help > Secret Agent
Updates Secret Agent window to use transparent title bar style
Fixes Auto Layout warnings on Secret Agent window
Fixes Secret Agent login animation improperly resizing window in some cases
Fixes crash when attempting to determine whether Touch ID authentication is available
Ensures that Sync only checks for Zetetic folder in the root of Google Drive
Fixes Delete Category confirmation sheet not being dismissed when action is chosen (macOS 10.10)
Fixes crash when viewing entry view (macOS 10.10)
No longer displays Release Notes after setup on a new installation
Fixes crash that could occur when attempting to access preferences
Fixes edge case of Password Warnings not properly disappearing when no more warnings are present
Fixes Secret Agent login window ambiguous layout
Fixes Backups permissions error during revert/delete
Fixes Backups unselection when presenting warning prompt
Fixes occasional failure of keyboard shortcut command-enter to launch a selected field, such as a website URL
Fixes race condition when editing Note Entries
Fixes edge case crash when editing Note Entries
Fixes a crash that could occur when attempting to present a previously selected Entry
Improves display of byte tallies on Database Info view
Adds entry name to Delete Entry confirmation prompt title to make destructive operation clearer
Fixes minor memory leak
Prevents automatic text substitutions on entry's fields
Fixes improperly displaying lock notification (when screen locks) if Codebook is already locked
Adds error alert when attempting to authenticate with Drive and Keychain access is denied
Fixes presentation of category chooser when creating a new entry with no categories already present
Fixes category select menu failing to show categories with duplicate titles
Fixes inconsistent font display in note entries, and increases the font size
Fixes failure to reset data detector highlights properly on note views (e.g. URLs, addresses) when enabled
Adds connection information for network request alert prompts in Little Snitch network monitor
Fixes Secret Agent window not properly expanding to display search results in certain scenarios
Speeds up loading of Main Window after login
Improves initial user experience by dropping additional prompt to enable anonymous usage statistics
Fixes text color of new notes created in Dark Mode
Fixes background color of Magnify view in Dark Mode
Fixes improperly displayed unmasked confirm password field when toggling masking during setup in Dark Mode
Fixes color of TOTP codes and their countdown labels when selected
Increases maximum display height for note fields on an entry
Fixes state of editing mode when switching notes
Fixes clipping of Password Review and Password Warnings view on macOS 10.14 Mojave
Avoids prompting for Touch ID when unavailable because the built-in display is closed
Adds a new Learn More button for Secret Agent on the Preferences window
Updates tooltips and accessibility properties for Secret Agent on the Preferences window
Adds support for Touch ID login on supported MacBook Pro models
Adds support for Dark Mode on macOS Mojave 10.14
Adds support for importing Keeper, LastPass, and 1Password CSV export files under File menu, Import
Adds blocker view to Main Window when minimized in the Dock
Fixes bug caused by legacy location for sync rollback database
Fixes Copy tab bar button validation on the Entry view when no field is selected
Adds logo artwork to the somewhat spartan Getting Started view
Fixes jumping cursor caused by space bar on Note Entries in certain scenarios
Optimizes entry loading, speeding up login times
Optimizes generation of the options menu in the add new field button
Adds support for Select All on the entries list (keyboard shortcut command A when entries list is active responder)
Enables search scope in search field, includes an option to add labels to the search
Adds a new Export Selected Entries option to the File > Export menu
Fixes the new Password Review feature's "Loading..." placeholder improperly displaying when Password Review is deactivated
Fixes crash on OS X Yosemite 10.10 when editing records (whoops!)
Adjusts preference persistence on application start-up
Disables relaunch on login to mitigate unresponsive application window bug
Adds a new Password Review feature that checks the password you're editing against the HaveIBeenPwned.com service, listing over half a billion hacked and stolen passwords (enable in Preferences)
Adopts a new custom display for the autocomplete suggestions shown while editing fields
Fixes the autocomplete suggestions being improperly dimissed by word boundaries on editing (typing "http://" no longer dismisses matching suggestions)
Improves layout and appearance consistency of Password Warnings and Secret Agent Action suggestions
Fixes a regression where clicking Dock icon did not show the Main Window
Fixes account name label under Sync menu after Google Drive authorization
Improvements to entry and category icon chooser menu, including the size and layout, load time, and selection handling
Fixes crash when using up and down arrow keys on the Views/Categories list
The Release Notes are now selectable and can be copied to the clipboard
Password reset now includes instructions for updating other copies
Fixes Magnify Window not properly appearing on macOS El Capitan
Secret Agent search results now filter out entries with no fields
Secret Agent Default Action now selects fields based on "First in the List" rather than prioritizing Email over Username and Password over PIN
Allows dashes in TOTP codes
Fixes inability to delete/revert backups on macOS 10.10
Fixes not properly reloading Secret Agent search results after modifying data through the main window
Fixes improperly displaying entry details in Secret Agent after entry was deleted by main window
Fixes Secret Agent incorrectly displaying Note Entries in search results
Fixes window height animation race condition which was causing empty results to display instead of resizing
Guards against category/entry selections that aren't present in the current list
Adds Magnify field value (⌘ + Y)
TOTP field text color turns red when down to the last 3 seconds
Ensures any presented sheets are dismissed when Codebook locks
Fix Sync > Unlink menu item not showing Dropbox accout name after initially linking
No longer automatically recreates password field label if deleted
Updates add field label control after editing labels through Customize Labels
Add field label control no longer truncates longer label names
Adds tooltips for bottom bar buttons
Adjusts layout of Entry details field table to fix clipping, impropper alignment, and misalignment of TOTP progress/seconds
A brand new icon style and fifty new icons, bringing the set to 200! 🎄
Increased row height for Views, Categories, and Entries lists
Fixes duplicating text display glitch on the Entry view after dragging a field to the previously selected field location
Fixes clipping of masked values in Secret Agent on macOS High Sierra 10.13
Fixes types sort order preference regression
Ensures the Entry view reloads in response to all label edits in Customize Labels
Floats Categories group row
Includes mitigation for preference persistence bug on High Sierra 10.13.1 🐛
Fixes next (tab) key loop on Secret Agent search view and details view
Fixes over-eager polling of cloud service user profile for sync when settings change
Fixes TOTP row display glitch in Secret Agent details view
Greatly improves display of bundled record icons
Fixes crash on record paste
Fixes sort of icons in icon chooser view
Adds an exclude characters field feature to the Password Generator
Resumes regular entry selection after Search field is cleared
Ensures License Window is closed and Main Window is activated upon license install via link for trial-expired customers
Fixes escape key cancellation of edits to field values
Fixes failure to consistently put newly added fields in edit mode
Fixes some edge case crashes in WiFi sync
Fixes race condition when copying and pasting entries
Fixes failure to update category label on entry view after category name change
Secret Agent Action fields now support arbitrary text
Secret Agent window will reload the entry it was previous displaying in case an edit to the entry has occurred
Fixes split view improperly resizing when displaying a note entry in certain cases
Fixes incorrect edit toggling behavior when no entry is selected
Fixes update date showing at bottom of window when no entry is selected
Fixes newly added entry not being selected properly when previously editing the name of another entry
Fixes incorrectly not ending editing when adding a new category
Updates duplicate removal logic when syncing
Now defaults new categories to an empty name
Add cancel button to category edit sheet
Disables selection of password warnings tableview
Increases Diceware password generator default length to 6
Diceware password generator maintains separate length preference
Enables Automatic Reference Counting
Fixes thread race conditions on login and after sync completes
Fixes multiple memory leaks
Removes use of deprecated macOS APIs
Fixes blank Codebook window on Yosemite when updating with Google Drive linked
Fixes Secret Agent bug in Safari when inserting more than 16 characters into certain sites
Adds new Compact Database feature to File menu
Fixes memory leaks
Fixes issues with the Merge Labels Window
Fixes crash when WiFi disconnects/computer sleeps in certain situations when Desktop WiFi Sync is selected
Updates Google Drive sync to use updated API
Updates Dropbox sync to latest SDK
Fixes failure to properly load all new labels on Import until full data reload
Fixes improper switching of sync preference
Fixes improper invalidation of menu items after canceling a sync operation
Fixes incorrect alphabetical sorting of types when exporting to CSV
Properly dismisses sync sheet if sync completes while main window is hidden
Highlights the location of the searched term within a record when selecting it from the search results list
Updates SQLCipher to version 3.4.1
Adds a new Export Favorites option under the File menu
Adds Credits and Copyrights link to the About Codebook information window
The Run Default Action command in Secret Agent (keyboard shortcut command R) is available on the search results view
Adds PIN fields to Run Default Action if a password field is not found
Adjusts observation of editing notes to avoid extraneous saves when no edit has taken place
Corrects missing first responder and keyboard control on Setup views
Fixes improper dismissal of Setup view
Fixes loss of state on the selected Sync type radio button in Preferences
Fixes improper masking of newly added fields in some situations
Fixes accessibility of unsupported window tabbing
Fixes the "missing lock_icon" log message
Fixes inconsistency in escaping label names in Export
Adds new Word List options for generating Diceware passwords
Word List defaults to Electronic Frontier Foundation list
Ends edit mode when starting WiFi sync to ensure pending edits are persisted
Fixes issue where Integrity Check wouldn't resolve orphaned entries/fields if the Unfiled category already existed
Updates Dropbox sync to latest SDK release for bug fixes
Fixes crash related to blank entry names
Adds support for selecting multiple categories and entries in the Main Window
Adds check in Auto Lock to avoid locking while sync is in progress
Fixes regression on persisting a label change
Fixes updated/created dates not displaying when Region is set to a 24 hour display mode (i.e. UK), but date/ time is set to 12 hour display mode
Updates Dropbox compatibility for bug fixes
Adds new Run Default Action feature to Secret Agent
Adds new Merge Label feature to Customize Labels
Displays number of fields to be deleted on Remove Label confirmation prompt in Customize Labels
Remove Label will no longer prompt for confirmation if there are no fields assigned to the label being deleted
Updates Dropbox sync to use API version 2
Includes Secret Agent patch for macOS Sierra 10.12.3 beta
Fixes Secret Agent bug on macOS Sierra 10.12.2 improperly adjusting case of characters on insert
Fixes persistence of Secret Agent preference to user defaults
Fixes bug where certain password generator insertions were not persisting
Optimizes row height calculations of multiline fields in fields table
Fixes issue with Secret Agent entering improper values when using certain international key layouts
Fixes inconsistency in behavior after cancelling Secret Agent login
Maintains the same locking state for Secret Agent and the Main Window
Fixes Edit (command+E) from Secret Agent's Entry view
Fixes Local Folder Sync not persisting Sandboxed folder access permission
Fixes crash at startup on Yosemite
Fixes password weakness warnings showing improperly when generating a random password
Shows password weakness warnings when generating a potentially weak random password
Fixes obscured password weakness warnings and Secret Agent Action suggestions towards the bottom of view
Fixes truncation of release notes
Fixes plain text exporter duplicating entries
Attempts to fix post-login crash on selection of previously viewed record
Adds new password weakness warnings
Adds new Action commands for Secret Agent
Various bug and crashes fixed
Fixes bug preventing WiFi sync with Codebook for Android from working correctly
Fixes sorting of entries list after Journal sort preference changes
Import and Export support a boolean Favorite column in CSV data
Import and Export support "Entry Icon" and "Category Icon" columns
Allows for untitled entries during Import
Fixes Google Drive sync failure
Fixes validation of unmasked password fields on setup view for master password
Fixes race condition in Secret Agent launch behavior
Adjust keyboard shortcut for Add Field to command-plus
Adds new Edit shortcut button to Secret Agent (command E)
Fixes Remove Entry toolbar button validation
Corrects Edit Entry button validation
New first time setup experience
Preserves record selection after sync completes
Fixes crash on launch when backup URL is missing
Adjusts first responder on edit entry
Improves layout of the password generator and defaults for length/words
Adds a Reload button to the password generator
Fixes improper display of the password generator
Improves display of Release Notes
Fixes reload of categories after import
Adds new Diceware option to Password Generator
Fixes Main Window crash on OS X 10.8 and 10.9 (10.10 and 10.11 unaffected)
New History view added to the Views list
Create an Entry (⌘ N) or a Note (option ⌘ N) any time (when no category is selected Codebook will prompt for one)
Updates the embedded SQLCipher library to the latest release, 3.4.0
Adds Edit button to the Main Window’s tab (key event) loop
Changes Lock Window keyboard shortcut to ⌘ L
Changes Show Customize Labels keyboard shortcut to shift ⌘ L
Various performance improvements and bug fixes
Fixes field row display turning black when editing large fields
Adds support for Cut (command+X) to move entries without drag and drop
Allows dragging an entry in a View list or Search results (e.g. Favorites) into a category to change its category assignment
Adds a keyboard shortcut command+hyphen for removing a selected field while editing an entry
Adds support for Undo (command+Z) and Redo (shift+command+Z) while editing an entry
Improves cut/copy/paste/delete validation
Updates controls with new accessibility labels and help descriptions
Adds new Journal view showing all your Note entries in one place
Fixes document save dialog sheet being shown improperly
Adds a plain text export format
Removes EntryID from CSV export
Improves speed and reliability of CSV import
Import no longer supports bulk update (columns named EntryID will be treated as any other field data)
Adds new search-in-note field on note entry view (use the return key to cycle through results)
Enables data detectors on the note entry view (links, addresses, etc)
Adds preference for data detectors on the note entry view (disabled by default)
Updates Categories view to distinguish between Categories and Views
Fixes bug in Main Window and Secret Agent presentation
Fixes crash on OS X 10.8 for TOTP fields
Fixes several deprecation warnings
Fixes CA Transaction warning
Fixes entries view count label display
Allows for Toolbar customization
Preserves Main Window split view borders
Corrects various dialogs still displaying previous app name, STRIP
Fixes crash on Export when Notes are present in data
Export format updated to export Note data in "Entry Note" column in CSV
Import format updated to import "Entry Note" fields as Note records
Adjusts Categories and Entries listing cell heights to be the same height
Adds Favorites as a drag-and-drop target for adding records to Favorites
Adds Recents view, displaying recently accessed records
STRIP renamed to Codebook
New icon, new look!
Adds Favorites
Adds note entries
